greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Centered 36-gonal numbers.
comment: Sequence found by reading the line from 1, in the direction 1, 37, ..., in the square spiral whose vertices are the generalized hendecagonal numbers A195160. Semi-axis opposite to A195321 in the same spiral.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 16 2011
